data.quote: Life is about making an impact, not making an income.
data.author: Kevin Kruse

data.quote: But those who hope in the LORD will renew their strength. They will soar on wings like eagles; they will run and not grow weary, they will walk and not be faint.
data.author: Isaiah 40:31

data.quote: Change only happens when ordinary people get involved, and they get engaged, and they come together to demand it.
data.author: Barrack Obama
data.sourceName: Farewell Speech at McCormick Place, Chicago

data.quote: Unless you try to do something beyond what you have already mastered, you will never grow.
data.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

data.quote: It's always too early to quit.
data.author: Norman Vincent Peale

data.quote: Faith is the art of holding on to things your reason has once accepted, in spite of your changing moods.
data.author: C.S. Lewis
